analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/42/0xa6b44770b737ea56554e2542c58637409594c630.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/42/0xa6b44770b737ea56554e2542c58637409594c630.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/42/0xa6b44770b737ea56554e2542c58637409594c630.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
